content: I do not have access to current plans of lüneburg regarding the development of new transportation technology. however, cities worldwide are looking towards the future by investing in sustainable transportation options such as electric vehicles, bike-sharing programs, and greener public transport. additionally, many cities are also exploring the potential of autonomous vehicles, which could transform the way people and goods are transported. it would be interesting to see what plans and strategies lüneburg has in place for the ongoing development of its transportation infrastructure to support its future economic development.
